scripts.release: sh -c 'npm version $VERSION' && npm run bundle && sh -c 'git tag $VERSION' && git push --tags && git push
scripts.bundle: npm run dist && cd dist/ && sh -c 'bestzip ../release/kol.$VERSION.ankiaddon *'
scripts.dist: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && cp -r kol/* dist/ && rm dist/user_files/*
